LightningComponentBundle.description: This help users select and upload a file.

property.name: fieldId
property.label: Field Id
property.description: Field Id - must be unique to this process

property.name: acceptedFormats
property.label: Accepted File Formats
property.description: A valid case-insensitive filename extension, starting with a period (.) character. For example: .jpg, .pdf, or .doc.

property.name: maxFileSizeInMB
property.label: Max Files Size Allowed (in MB)
property.description: The maximum file size allowed to upload in MB (Max Value should not be greater than Salesforce Standards)

property.name: required
property.label: Required?
property.description: If True, user must enter at least one file.

property.name: useApexToSaveFile
property.label: Use Apex Function to Save File
property.description: Must be set to True - {!$GlobalConstant.True}. [This feature is not yet enabled]

property.name: recordId
property.label: Related Record ID
property.description: The ID of the Salesforce record to associate the files with. A value must be entered or the flow will fail.

property.name: filesUploaded
property.label: Uploaded file names
property.description: Semi-colon delimited list of file names uploaded. Text variable. Output only.

property.name: filesUploadedCollection
property.label: Uploaded file names Collection
property.description: A collection variable to hold the names of any files uploaded. Output only.
